summary: The Biochar Research Network Act of 2025 directs the Secretary of Agriculture to establish a national biochar research network. This network will conduct research on various biochar types, application methods, and their impact on soil health, climate mitigation, crop production, and farm profitability. The bill aims to provide science-based information to land managers, focusing on sustainable biochar production and application, and authorizes $50 million annually from 2026-2030 for its implementation.
